data.title: Mark Falkin – The Official Manuscript Wish List Website
data.text:
My favorites include…

Film: Sideways, Ken Burns The Civil War, Blazing Saddles/Young Frankenstein, Jaws, Animal House, American Werewolf in London, Blue Velvet, Dr. Strangelove, Pulp Fiction, Fargo, Wall Street, Michael Clayton, Blade Runner, The Last Picture Show, Apocalypse Now, Goodfellas/Casino, Who’s Afraid of Virginia Woolf?, The Lighthouse, One Flew Over the Cuckoo’s Nest, 2001: A Space Odyssey, The Big Lebowski, Cabaret, Moneyball, Hoosiers, Glengarry Glen Ross, Birdman, Capote, Ed Wood, The Jerk, The Birdcage, Eddie Izzard: Dressed to Kill, LA LA Land, The Wrestler, The Shining, Boogie Nights, Malcolm X, Muhammad Ali: When We Were Kings, All the President’s Men, The Verdict, Rear Window, Spinal Tap, Withnail and I, The Adam McKay Films, Finding Nemo . . . I could go on for quite some time here.

Podcasts: Ellis James & John Robbins, Rachel Maddow Presents, The Al Franken Podcast, Post Mortem with Mick Garris, The Movies That Made Me, Kermode & Mayo’s Take, Caught Offside

Radio: KOOP The Lounge Show, KUTX Twine Time/Uptown Saturday Night, BBC6, KCRW Electric 24, vintage Howard Stern

Music: 70s-90s Indie Rock & Post-Punk & New Wave, e.g., R.E.M., Nirvana, The Pixies, Radiohead, Janes, NIN, Depeche Mode, The Cars, Talking Heads, B-52’s; 60s era jazz; New Orleans Jazz and Second Line; Zydeco; Rockabilly; Instrumental surf rock of the 60s; 50s & 60s Lounge (esp. via Jay Robillard); Western Swing/Hot Jazz; Broadway; Kae/Kate Tempest’s spoken words; 70s Classic Rock; Americana/No Depression; old Country & Bluegrass; Scotch-Irish Folk; vintage Halloween horror sounds & music; A Tribe Called Quest . . . I could go on for quite some time here.

TV: Vintage Warner Bros. Looney Tunes, The Simpsons, Drunk History, Anthony Bourdain: No Reservations, Frontline, Morning Joe, Premier League on NBC, The Bear

Non-client books I’ve recently loved:
